title: Provide Technical Application Support
description: A customer is using a new adhesive product and asks for advice on the optimal curing temperature and time for their specific substrate.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the specific adhesive product they are using.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the product in question.

tasks.description: Search the internal technical knowledge base for application guides related to this product and substrate type.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a technical data sheet (TDS) with recommended curing profiles.

tasks.description: Relay the recommended curing conditions (e.g., '120°C for 30 minutes') to the customer and offer to email them the TDS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the technical advice and sends the supporting document.
